Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I have a hard time when I read something that dovetails with my fears and my own inner tapes. Despite having heard sound info to the contrary a hundred times, my brain will latch on ferociously, like “seE I ToLD yOu!!” with zero critical assessment of the info or the source. It’s just a blast of emotions.   Maybe try to pause, take a step back, and look at the source and the factual basis of the apple-shaming? It sounds like it’s absolutely the voice of an eating disorder. It just happens to be someone else’s eating disorder. <3
